name: duolingo_scrape_leaderboard
description: Scrape the Duolingo leaderboard. Requires login.

steps.label: Open Duolingo learn page (leaderboard is in sidebar)

steps.code: const entries = []; document.querySelectorAll('[class*="leaderboard"] li, [class*="Leaderboard"] tr, [class*="row"]').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 20) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('[class*="name"], a, span'); const xpEl = el.querySelector('[class*="xp"], [class*="score"]'); entries.push({ rank: i + 1, name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', xp: xpEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); return { entry_count: entries.length, entries };
steps.name: result
steps.label: Extract data
